last_episode_to_air.overview: Just as they have packed their bags and are about to leave, Ji Hoon has disappeared and is nowhere to be found. Will Ji Hoon be able to survive the accident in the end or is he bound to face his tragic end?
last_episode_to_air.name: Please Come Back to Me Again

name: Once Again
overview: Jae-woo is a young man who lives with childhood trauma and finds himself traveling to the past where he meets Ji-hoon, a law student preparing for a bar exam and the person Jae-woo admires the most. As he travels to the past, will he be able to change each other's fate?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Shin Jae Woo is haunted by painful memories, yearning to change his destiny and that of Kang Ji Hoon. In 2007, their paths crossed, and Shin Jae Woo fell for Kang Ji Hoon deeply. However, fate tore them apart, and he's carried the guilt ever since. Fifteen years later, he finds himself in the dormitory where Kang Ji Hoon lived. Holding an intercom receiver, he hears Kang Ji Hoon's voice, realizing he's traveled back to 2007. Moving into the next room, he tries to rekindle their friendship, despite Kang Ji Hoon's confusion about this stranger who keeps calling him "uncle."

tagline: When longing comes from love... what kind of story will it unveil?

episodes.name: Hello?
episodes.overview: A troubled Jae Woo begins having nightmares again and finds himself recalling a life-altering accident from many years ago. Although he was successfully able to escape the disaster that stills haunts him till today, his savoir, Ji Hoon, wasn't that lucky, meeting his end there and then. On this day, Jae Woo decides to return to Room 303 at the Hanmaeum Dormitory where Ji Hoon previously lived. Feeling like he still has a lot to say to Ji Hoon, Jae Woo picks up the telephone in the room only to hear what sounds like Ji Hoon's voice coming out from the other side of the line.

episodes.name: The one I longed for.
episodes.overview: Flashback to 2007, Ji Hoon is a student busy preparing for his law exams. One night, as he's returning home, Ji Hoon suddenly finds himself running into a man attempting to kidnap a boy who turns out to be none other than Jae Woo. And while Ji Hoon is able to save Jae Woo from his abductor and prepares to send him back home, Jae Woo is just too afraid to go anywhere for the night.

episodes.name: Approaching You
episodes.overview: Upon time traveling back to 15 years, Jae Woo decides to rent a room in the Hanmaeum Dormitory and seize the opportunity to get to know Ji Hoon, However, Jae Woo's sudden appearance in Ji Hoon's life has his friend, Hyung Jin feeling suspicious.

episodes.name: Shall we go on a trip?
episodes.overview: After learning that Ji Hoon is destined to meet his end on the day of his examinations, Jae Woo decides to find a way to stop the tragedy from happening. The first thing that he thinks of is to invite Ji Hoon on a trip...

episodes.name: Crossing Years
episodes.overview: When Ji Hoon overhears a conversation between Jae Woo and Jae Woo's childhood self, he begins to think that there is something strange about all of this for which he then seeks Jae Woo to clarify what exactly is going on.

episodes.name: A Necklace and A photo
episodes.overview: In an effort to change his and Ji Hoon's fate once and for all, Jae Woo decides to directly confront his abductor at his home and put a stop to the tragic incident from 15 years ago. However, upon encountering his abductor, the two end up in an intense scuffle. Does Jae Woo have what it takes to subdue the culprit?

episodes.name: I Want You to Feel At Ease
episodes.overview: In response to Jae Woo's wishes, Ji Hoon decides to go on a trip with him. Yet, at the same time. the day of the dreaded accident draws closer and closer…

episodes.name: Please Come Back to Me Again
episodes.overview: Just as they have packed their bags and are about to leave, Ji Hoon has disappeared and is nowhere to be found. Will Ji Hoon be able to survive the accident in the end or is he bound to face his tragic end?

However, fate tore them apart, and he's carried the guilt ever since. Fifteen years later, he finds himself in the dormitory where Kang Ji Hoon lived.
